title: ARC Raiders is an oddly comforting reminder that Earth will get along just fine without us after the AI apocalypse
description: Embark Studios' extraction shooter takes cues from sci-fi classics to establish a dark future, but its cautionary tale is more believable than most.
content: Embark Studios' extraction shooter takes cues from sci-fi classics to establish a dark future, but its cautionary tale is more believable than most.
